title: Adepta Sororitas vs Space Marines - 1000pts
description: Battle report of our second affrontement with our armies. Emmanuel switched quite a few units around, and I did not because nothing new was built.

list.name: Canoness
equipment: Blessed blade, Plasma pistol, Saintly example

list.name: Canoness with Jump Pack
equipment: Blessed halberd, Through Suffering Strength

list.name: Battle Sisters Squad
equipment: 1x Sister Superior: Plasma pistol, Power weapon
6x Battle Sister: Boltgun, Bolt pistol, Close combat weapon
1x Battle Sister: Simulacrum Imperialis, Boltgun, Bolt pistol, Close combat weapon
1x Battle Sister: Meltagun, Bolt pistol, Close combat weapon
1x Battle Sister: Multi-melta, Bolt pistol, Close combat weapon

list.name: Arco-flagellants
equipment: 3x Arco-flagellant: Arco-flails

list.name: Repentia Squad
equipment: 1x Repentia Superior: Bolt pistol, Neural Whips
4x Sister Repentia: Penitent Eviscerator

list.name: Seraphim Squad
equipment: 1x Seraphim Superior: Plasma pistol, Power weapon
2x Seraphim: 2 Bolt pistols, Close combat weapon
2x Seraphim: 2 Ministorum hand flamers, Close combat weapon

list.name: Seraphim Squad
equipment: 1x Seraphim Superior: Plasma pistol, Power weapon
2x Seraphim: 2 Bolt pistols, Close combat weapon
2x Seraphim: 2 Ministorum hand flamers, Close combat weapon

equipment: 1x Zephirim Superior: Plasma pistol, Power weapon, Sacred Banner
4x Zephirim: Bolt pistol, Power weapon

equipment: Exorcist Missile Launcher, Hunter-killer missile, Heavy Bolter, Armoured tracks

list.name: Gladiator Valiant

content.content: deployment is a bit messy, but with more terrain, we're all hidden! Great!

can't do establish locus (didn't advance enough troops at the start) and bring it down is kinda hard... but maybe, yes who knows... The exorcist shoots the gladiator. Plenty of shoots, one wound. Failed. damage roll. 6! Good start but it's not dead, but the rhino moved forward to bring the repentia to the right, there is an angle for the gladiator! The hunter killer missile hits, wounds. Damage roll. 6!!!

Well, that's a gladiator down, and I felt quite sorry for the opponent. On the left side, I didn't move my flagellant, I'm not sure they can handle the leftenant, on the right side, the rhino moved up but that's it.
